com.google.template.soy.soytree
Class SoytreeUtils

extends Object

Shared utilities for the 'soytree' package.

Important: Do not use outside of Soy code (treat as superpackage-private).

Method Detail

createSoySyntaxExceptionWithMetaInfo

public static SoySyntaxException createSoySyntaxExceptionWithMetaInfo(@Nullable
                                                                      String message,
                                                                      @Nullable
                                                                      Throwable cause,
                                                                      SoyNode soyNode)
Creates a SoySyntaxException with template name and file name filled in based on the given Soy parse tree node. The Soy node must be part of a full parse tree.

Parameters:
message - The exception message, or null to use the messge from the cause. Parameters 'message' and 'cause' may not both be null.
cause - The cause of this exception, or null if not applicable. Parameters 'message' and 'cause' may not both be null.
soyNode - The Soy node to get the template name and file name from.
Returns:
The new SoySyntaxException object.

visitAllExprs

public static void visitAllExprs(SoyFileSetNode soyTree,
                                 AbstractExprNodeVisitor<Void> exprNodeVisitor)
Given a Soy tree and a visitor for expression trees, traverses the Soy tree and executes the visitor on all expressions held by nodes in the Soy tree.

Parameters:
soyTree - The Soy tree to traverse.
exprNodeVisitor - The visitor to execute on all expressions.
